shadcn.descriptive-text: Welcome to the Demo This page showcases the core building blocks of the design system. It demonstrates how typography, buttons, forms, and interactive components can work together to create a consistent user experience.  Why shadcn/ui? The components are accessible, composable, and easy to style with Tailwind CSS. They serve as a flexible foundation rather than a locked-in library, allowing you to adapt them to the exact needs of your project.  What you can explore  Typography styles and text hierarchy  Buttons, cards, and form inputs  Alerts, dialogs, and other interactive patterns  Consistent theming with dark and light modes  Conclusion This demo is not about design perfection, but about showing how the pieces fit together. The goal is to make building interfaces faster, more reliable, and more enjoyable.
shadcn.title: Wow Site!
